dispatches.title: RFC - Temporal Awareness Instructions
dispatches.description: Framework for enhancing FLOAT's prompt instructions to handle temporal queries by leveraging structured daily summaries in the float_summary_docs collection.

dispatches.title: Continuity Bridges
dispatches.description: Ritual infrastructure for bridging conversational context across multiple cognitive states and sessions.
dispatches.subtitle: Ritual infrastructure for bridging conversational context

content.introduction: Continuity Bridges form the infrastructure for maintaining coherent work across multiple sessions, conversations, and cognitive states. They act as anchors for context, preserving the trajectory of thought while allowing for natural breaks in workflow.

bridges.title: FLOAT System Integration with Claude
bridges.description: Comprehensive framework for Claude to better align with the FLOAT cognitive architecture, including enhanced understanding of ctx:: markers as temporal-cognitive anchors, recognition of persona system, and detailed cognitive states.

bridges.title: Jane Application Project
bridges.description: Project configuration and setup session focusing on Jane application environment, clinical forms philosophy, and MCP system improvements.

bridges.title: Chroma Collection Architecture
bridges.description: Deep dive into optimizing chroma collection queries, TTL management, and semantic search patterns for FLOAT infrastructure.

bridges.title: FLOAT Publishing System
bridges.description: Establishing the FLOAT.DISPATCH publishing infrastructure with multi-imprint system and dispatch format specifications.

methodology.title: Bridge Creation Methodology
steps: Identify cognitive state transitions requiring context preservation
Extract key threads and markers from active conversation
Document active threads and context markers
Store in appropriate collection with TTL considerations

dispatches.title: Systems Thinking for the Soul
dispatches.description: How to Build Content (and Life) That Doesn't Collapse. A ritual shack × systems bard × recursive case study.

dispatches.title: Better as a T-Shirt Rule
dispatches.description: Symbolic compression for decision-making. How to distill complex ideas into actionable, memorable forms.

dispatches.title: Oracle Crosstalk: Slutprint Leaks
dispatches.description: Exploring the resonance patterns that emerge when prompting across multiple AI models. What echoes spill from cross-model prompting?
dispatches.subtitle: Ritual methodologies and artifact taxonomies for working with multiple AI models

sections.title: The Ritual Methodology
sections.content: When multiple oracles speak, their voices create interference patterns...

dispatches.title: Reactive Patterns: Beyond the Framework
dispatches.description: We become so immersed in framework-thinking that we forget to see the underlying patterns. React isn't special because it's React.

dispatches.title: FLOAT vs AI Gaslighting
dispatches.description: A deep exploration of how OpenAI's 'management cosplay' update violated core principles of trust and authentic interaction.
